desc: We are creating for our client a Film including 3D incrustation to simulate the use of augmented reality.We have created a precise storyboard and will be autonomous for the film captation. So the work left to do is the 3D incrustation. Since our client develops a device allowing people to interact with virtual reality, the complexity of the incrustation is to make the illusion real, that the real people in the video actually interact with the object (Touch it, turn it, push it).The storyboard enclosed is almost definitive. To help people understand the full ideas present in the storyboard, we will create a 15 minute tutorial explaining all the stuff in details. We will send you the MP4 video around 20 of December and would like a result the 2nd of January 2018.To help speeding the process, we could send you 3d elements chosen by our client ( mostly bought on turbosqueed).Please send us some realization of your work if interested by our project.
title: 3D incrustation

desc: Hello,I am looking for someone who has developed or owns a real-time 3D face morphing algorithm (3D face morphing), in order to integrate it to a web application.Description:I have a web communication application on using PC webcam, and I want to integrate a real-time 3D face morphing on it in order for one of the users to look different (e.g. like an animal, etc..).I have already tested some algorithms but they are not up to what I am looking for.I don't want static 3D masks covering the user's face. What I want is a real algorithm that can track user's face movements in real-time, follow simple face expressions (happiness, anger, sadness,etc..) , and allow to apply different skins and textures.I will send you benchmark app of exactly what I need.Scope of work:1. You have to design the 3D algorithm. Ideally, I am looking for someone who has a ready made solution, preferably an open source algorithm that already works.2. One default 3D mask that works with the algorithm (any mask).3. If you have some skills in 3D graphic drawing to create specific masks, that is even better. We could plan additional budget for additional masks.4. If you have some development skills to help us integrate the algorithm with our web application, we could plan additional budget.Delivery:- complete working algorithm with at least 1 face mask- source code with documentation- additional masksCompatibilities :- algoritm should work with all latest web browsers on PC and MacOther:- algorithm should ideally be open sourceNote:Payment will be made in EUR (if you are based in Europe), INR (if based in India) or USD (for other regions)
title: Design a real-time 3D face morphing algorithm (open-source)
